resources.string: If you enable this option, you can reduce the internal storage, but this is a reason of make a lag of other apps.
Only using internal storage(Don\'t use external storage)
Any Skins won\'t be changed.\nSelect more than one skin to change.
Want update? Tap here to open Google Play.
Tap [Uninstall] (-> [Yes]) -> [Install] to update.\nYou can change skin using this app again.
It is main character in Minecraft.
It is popluar enemy in Minecraft.
It is ... I don\'t know what to say...
Cows are so loudly like \"Moo Moo\"! Ummm...
Yeah! It\'s a tr... treasure! (Maybe lied)
Baa... Um? ... I did! It\'s a sheep! Hahaha...
Want change skins more? I\'m working on it...

string-array.name: checkName
string-array.item: Checking Minecraft PE can be copied...

string-array.name: errors
string-array.item: Minecraft PE is not installed. Install it and start this app again.
Minecraft PE\'s APK file cannot be copied.\nIf you are using Android 4.4(KitKat), update to 5.0(Lollipop) or downgrade the version.\nAndroid 4.4 doesn\'t allow to copy non-free app.

string-array.name: modSteps
string-array.item: Copying a Minecraft PE APK to working folder...
Copying a changed APK to External Storage...
Complete! Install it and have fun!
